summary:
Montreal, Jan. 21, 2013 - Python developer Éric Araujo portraits Guido van Rossum, a Dutch computer programmer who is best known as the author of the Python programming language.

Useful links:
* Guido: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guido_van_Rossum
* Éric: http://www.linkedin.com/in/merwok
* MP34: http://montrealpython.org/2013/01/mp34/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Person of the Month: Guido van Rossum #MP34
